txt.en: This strange puddle of foetid liquid may hold some clue as to the corruption occurring in the Lich Bluffs.\n\nThe Ranger Mincham might have further insight on the origins of this strange, foul liquid.

'The place where you found this horrific liquid bodes ill for all. I fear that this might be one of the instruments that some darker force is employing to raise the wights in the area.\n\n'My hope is that we can locate an intact phial of this liquid so we may discern its origins.'
You have taken a sample of a strange foetid liquid from outside one of the barrows in the Lich Bluffs.
Talk to Mincham in the Lich Bluffs

Mincham's camp is located north and west of the main road, in the north-west portion of the Lich Bluffs.\n\nYou should return to Mincham and provide him with a sample of the foul liquid that you have recovered.
